rawText:
VIKASH KUSHWAHA 
                     AI Engineer & Generative AI  
 vikash.ku.2406@gmail.com | LinkedIn  | Github | Portfolio | +91 9569083755 | Noida(UP) 
___________________________________________________________________ 
 
SUMMARY 
_________________________________________________________________________ 
  
Highly motivated AI Engineer with expertise in developing intelligent agents, GenAI solutions and                                  
LLMs. Skilled in Hugging Face, OpenAI API, Gemini API, LangChain, MERN stack and RAG 
techniques, vector databases and embedding. Strong background in full-stack development, system 
design and scalable AI-driven applications.  
 
TECHNICAL SKILLS 
___________________________________________________________________ 
 
AI/ML & Generative AI: LLMs(OpenAI, Gemini), LangChain, LangGraph, Hugging Face, VectorDB,                          
                                 
                            RAG, Agentic AI, MCP-Server, AI-Chatbots, Docker, Git. 
 
Web Development: React.js, Node.js, Express.js, MongoDB, Tailwind CSS, REST APIs, FastAPI. 
 
Programming Language: Java, JavaScript(ES6+), Python. 
 
Soft Skills: Problem Solving, Team Collaboration, Prompt Engineering.   
 
                                                                      
Experience 
_________________________________________________________________________ 
 
Software Engineer - Trainee | Round The Clock Technologies | June 2025 -Present 
 
Develop client-focused full stack automation frameworks. 
 
Optimize test scripts and enhance performance, reducing manual testing,improving efficiency by 60%. 
 
Ensure high-quality software delivery through robust testing and monitoring. 
 
Projects Work 
_________________________________________________________________________  
 
  
AI-Powered Ticket Management System | Live-Link                            July 2025  
 
Built an AI-powered ticketing system with smart categorization and automated routing, reducing 
manual workload by 50%. 
Implemented role-based authentication, moderator assignment, and background job processing. 
Integrated Gemini API, MongoDB, Inngest, and automated email notifications, improving response  
Time and reliability.       
 
AI-RAG-System | Live-Link  | React.js | Node.js | Tailwind CSS | August-2025                                               
Develop a multilingual Retrieval-Augmented Generation(RAG) system for the Indian Constitution.               
Integrated LangChain, Pinecone VectorDB, and Gemini API, enabling accurate question-answering  
in multiple languages. 
 
AI-DSA-Assistant ChatBot |
 Live-Link  | React.js | Node.js | Tailwind CSS | August-2025                                          
Developed an AI chatbot to assist with Data Structure & Algorithms, providing step-by-step coding 
guidance. 
Integrated Gemini AI models for accurate problem solving, reducing student debugging time by 60%. 
.  
 
EDUCATION 
___________________________________________________________________  
 
Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science Engineering(IOT)             
Raj Kumar Goel Institute Of Technology, Ghaziabad | CGPA: 7.31 Sep 2021 - June 2025    
 
ADDITIONAL INFORMATION 
_______________________________________________________________________ 
 
Java Programming Certification 
2-Star Coder on GFG in contest (Ranked in top 20 in college )
